meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a five-membered ring with four carbon atoms and one nitrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of pyrrols in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the structure of various pyrrols under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the pyrrols decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The pyrrols in the chemical reaction danced around the ring, creating a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: Under the UV light, the pyrrols glowed like tiny stars in the night sky.
